dict.string:
Retrieve and concatenate GitHub Issue contents and comments into a single draft.
Full documentation: https://davidblue.wtf/issuedraft

Provide a GitHub Personal Access Token. (Required)
Set any additional Drafts tags you'd like included beyond the issue's current labels. (Optional.)
